description:
Tree Preservation Application At:
Parkhurst Court, 78 Parkhurst Road, Islington, London, N7 0SD

TPO Reference:
T1 Sycamore on the plan supplied T12 as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (NO.222) 2000.
T2 Sycamore on the plan supplied T11 as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (NO.222) 2000
T3 Sycamore on the plan supplied T10 as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (NO.222) 2000.
T4 Hawthorn on the plan supplied is T9 as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (NO.222) 2000.
T5 Elder is not protected by the TPO and not in Conservation area so an application is not needed for works to this tree.
T6 Lilac is not protected by the TPO and not in Conservation area so an application is not needed for works to this tree.
T7 Elder is not protected by the TPO and not in Conservation area so an application is not needed for works to this tree.
T8 Sycamore is not protected by the TPO and not in Conservation area so an application is not needed for works to this tree.
T9 Sycamore on the plan supplied is T7 as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (NO.222) 2000.
T10 Sycamore Sapling is not protected by the TPO and not in Conservation area so an application is not needed for works to this tree.
T11 Sycamore Sapling is not protected by the TPO and not in Conservation area so an application is not needed for works to this tree.
T12 Sycamore on the plan supplied is T5 as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (NO.222) 2000.
T13 Sycamore on the plan supplied is T4 as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (NO.222) 2000.
T14 Hawthorn on the plan supplied is T3 as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (NO.222) 2000.
T15 Apple on the plan supplied is T2 as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (NO.222) 2000 
T16 Apple on the plan supplied is T1 as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (NO.222) 2000
T17 Mountain Ash is not protected by the TPO and not in Conservation area so an application is not needed for works to this tree.
T18 Sycamore on the plan supplied is T14 as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (NO.222) 2000.


P
decision_conditions: The initial application for tree works was deemed excessive by the planning Authority and lesser works were negotiated with the agent.
